title: iPhone 7 - The Missing Feature...
description: iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus lack wireless charging. I decided to check out some accessories in order to add the feature. My results varied but I was ultimately able to successfully add wireless charging to the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus. Product links below!  My best results came with this accessory combo -  Spigen iPhone 7 Plus Liquid Armor (USA) -   Spigen iPhone 7 Plus Liquid Armor (International) -   iPhone Qi Wireless Adapter (USA) -    iPhone Qi Wireless Adapter (International) -   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
